author: USA TODAY, Joseph A. Ladapo, Opinion contributor
title: Coronavirus pandemic: We were caught unprepared. It is too late for shutdowns to save us
description: What we should do is to keep shutdowns short, keep the economy going and building our public health system for the pandemic.
content:
An epidemiologist answers the biggest questions she's getting about coronavirus.
Wochit
What we should do is to keep shutdowns short, keep the economy going and build our public health system for the pandemic.
